subject: Hockey, Ice
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit by the family of Steve Montador accuses the N.H.L. of breaching its duty to inform players about the long-term dangers of repeated brain trauma. Montador was found to have C.T.E. after his death at 35.
snippet: A lawsuit by the family of Steve Montador accuses the N.H.L. of breaching its duty to inform players about the long-term dangers of repeated brain trauma. Montador was found to have C.T.E. after his death at 35.
